author: eworley
msg: *) Adding IntegrationTest which compiles test source and verifies that the test source is copied to the right directory, and that the test assembly is created (Note that the test assembly does not currently execute in NUnit)

author: xli
msg: HARMONY-5304 :  [drlvm][gc_gen] assert in ClassCastTest from the reliability test suite:

apr_atomic_casptr() does not work correctly for 64-bit values, leave port_atomic_cas64() for 64-bit platforms. Also changed vt field in obj header to be 32bit (with 32 bits padding for 64bit platform.
